Hello! :) To all of you who cannot remove this extension because of "This setting is enforced by your administrator" or similar.. when you open chrome://policy you will see two-three options ... Now go to command prompt on your pc and run it as administrator then write there:
 RD /S /Q "%WinDir%\System32\GroupPolicyUsers"

RD /S /Q "%WinDir%\System32\GroupPolicy"

gpupdate /force

After every line press enter, after that when you open Chrome the extension will be gone ! :) Good luck!
